posts.post_content:
I am looking to buy a T206 Cycle 460 card as a type card to add to my collection. Looking for any player in pretty much any grade that won't break the bank. Perfer a somewhat presentable example but doesn't need to EX. Thanks in advance for any help. Ralph

Please send scan and price info: [url]rp12367@hotmail.com[/url]

Bump 

Hoping for a Black Friday miracle. Thx
